title: Consumption spending increases - AD shifts right

content.question: Which of the following changes would cause an economyâ€™s aggregate demand curve to shift to the right?

choices.label: An increase in spending on imports
An increase in autonomous consumption spending
A decrease in the money supply
A decrease in the overall price level in the economy

content.answer: An increase in autonomous consumption spending

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
